website_summaries.verdict: Brushless motors perform well on this cordless hedge trimmer.
pros: Uses a 2 ampere hour battery (not included) that supports up to an hour on a full charge
Delivers power without the stink of gas and oil
cons: 22 inches of cutting blade is less than stated 26 inches

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine with minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: My Greenworks Pro GHT80321 80V Hedge Trimmer delivered today 4/22/2017. I immediately charged the battery and put it to work. Pro: Very powerful, lightweight, cut nicely, much quieter than the gas power, and no nasty gas fumes. Con: The tip broke off when cutting Ivy and Black Berries branches. In my opinion the front end of the cutting blade is a bad design. See pictures. I would have give it a 5 stars if the tip didn't off during use.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Low quality connector makes it difficult to take apart after each use
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today. I have to admit that I was very disappointed with the very low tech push button that connects the trimmer to the pole and battery housing. It’s an absolute engineering failure. There are dozens of connectors and fasteners that would work better and I wish Greenworks had looked harder at that critical function. The balance of the unit is off as well making this a very tiring trimmer to work with. Customers may be better served with a lower voltage unit. I would advise people to look elsewhere until that connector is re-designed. Most people will need to take it apart after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Phrenologist

customer_reviews.title: Batteries get stuck inside of the tool
customer_reviews.text: Deal breaker! Huge problem with these batteries. They get stuck in the tool. EXTREMELY hard to remove. At this point I would not recommend any greenworks tools and I own them all. The batteries, I own 3, get stuck inside of all tools except for the mower. I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TheSharpElectricStar

customer_reviews.title: Works well but weighs a ton
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice tool with great features. Quality built too. It cuts well and is convenient using a battery versus an electric cord or gas. That's the good news. The bad news is it is very heavy and requires great strength if you are using for any length of time, especially if you need to extend your arms straight out or overhead. I am fit and regularly lift weights but it was truly a workout using this machine. I will not return it for its convenience considering I will only use it once or twice a year. I do have the Greenworks chainsaw and leaf blower and these items are amazing but the hedge trimmer, unfortunately, falls short.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: used once then stopped
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and then the product jammed and would not work. I contacted customer service only to be given list of requirements to prove that it was not functioning. Once I provided the list of 9 items to include a video they informed me that they would not have the product in stock for 6-8 weeks and I should contact them again at that time. They recommended returning the item through Amazon which I should have done from the beginning. Don't bother purchasing this item. In fact a had purchased an earlier cheaper model which also broke within 9 months beware of green works.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Song

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fine hedge trimmer, and the 80 volt battery gives it plenty of power. My only complaint is that it is heavier than the 24 volt model, and for home use I'm not sure it's better. The only reason I got it is because I already have the 80 volt leaf blower, which works great by the way. Honestly though, I think this trimmer is better suited for commercial purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Largo

customer_reviews.title: Great hedge trimmer and better customer service the 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: The battery charger had a bent pin and a broken plastic holding clip when I recieved it. Called Amazon support and received a credit for the price of the battery charger on my 2nd support call after I never heard back from my 1st call. The hedge trimmer itself works beautifully and with ease. I love its dual side power buttons and rotating handling to cut at different angles or with different hands. The battery outlasted fully trimming (11) smaller bushes, (4) medium sized bushes and (3) large bushes.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: As powerful & efficient as any gas hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: We have some tough plants to cut through, especially in spring. We have other battery trimmers for light cutting, but for the spring heavy cutting, only a gas hedge trimmer will "cut it." Sadly, most 2 cycle gas engines are a pain in the butt to start in spring. Our gas hedge trimmer, which weighs a ton, just wouldn't start. We already had the Greenworks 80V charger and battery for a blower I bought last year. So I thought I would try this Greenworks 80v hedge trimmer this spring. IT WORKED GREAT !!! A+ Powerful and very sharp blades. Never has our spring trimming been so easy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alex C. Cullison

customer_reviews.title: greenworks pro lawn care tools are terrific!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a number of the Greenworks Pro lawn care equipment. Without exception, they have all surpassed our expectations. The lawn mower is outstanding -easy to use/push, cuts well, quiet, and the battery lasts quite awhile. The leaf blower works better than any other one we have ever had. The hedge trimmer makes trimming shrubs seem easy (after getting used to handling it). It is heavy however. We also purchased the trimmer which is another great purchase. The batteries charge quickly. Very pleased with everything. Just a note - my husband and I are 66 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, terrible battery. Expensive for 1 year of life.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tool, it works well, and is well-designed. The batteries are terrible though; I’ve had two fail within 15 months of buying them. I was lucky the first time and it was under warranty, but now I’m faced with throwing a lot more money at batteries that will maybe last a year (of very light use), or throwing away the hundreds of dollars’ worth of otherwise good tools that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: S. Templar

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like butter
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few rechargable hedge trimmers but this brand is by far the best! Battery life is long and strong and cuts through hedges like butter--no bogging down at all nor has it jammed. Love that it has a protective cover to store in too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressive power here
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressive power here, super sharp blades, long reach - made incredibly short work of my seasonal trimming. Cut through heavy shrubs like nothing and surprised me by going through small tree branches. It's a little bit heavy for a long session of trimming, or working above your head, but the time savings vs manually trimming or using my old plug-in black & decker is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kefer

customer_reviews.title: 80 volt battery
customer_reviews.text: The eighty volt battery, as powerful as any gas operated trimmer, used it for the first time yesterday!! AMAZING was used for over an hour and at the last breath it was just as powerful as when i started to use it just Super, but it is kind of heavy, what i did in a little over an hour would have taken me two days to do, we have just about every garden & lawn equiptment this is just about the very best.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent  Sparella

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my first battery powered
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for about three months now. We have a huge number of shrubs to trim as well as hedges. The battery life 5080 V and four amp is longer than my arms care to use the machine. This is my first non-gas hedge trimmer and I would buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The Greenworks PRO 26" 80V Cordless Trimmer works good. It can get a bit heavy if you have high shrubs. The only other thing about it is you really have to hold the switch down when using, if you let up even the slightest you do not have full power. All in all better for quick jobs so you don't have to use a gas or electric trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, it's way more than I was expecting. It's very heavy duty and cuts thick berry bushes easily. Battery lasts longer than I do! I'm tired out (or just done with the job) long before the battery is dead. Overall, so happy with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Powers

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one light use,  terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good luck if you need to return a Greenworks item. This pole hedge trimmer broke after a light use, with zero signs of damage. I called customer service and after an hour and half waiting in line, I provided the serial number and the order number. I was told I would get an email with instructions within 10 minutes. It didn't show up after 24 hours but when I was on the phone with the rep I got her email address. I emailed her the invoice, no response after another day. Try to call again today and the hold time is two hours.
customer_reviews.author: rolwitz

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with how it works. It is very heavy. I have to take breaks in between because I can’t trim everything without stopping. But I am 52 years old. But I do a lot of yardwork and I’ve never had some thing this heavy but it is great quality. We also bought the blower and are very happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the pole hedge trimmer and the pole saw with one 80volt 2ah battery with charger last June 2019. The tools have been reliable and good quality. However after receiving the battery and charger I charged the battery 3 times according to the instructions. I returned it after it failed to charge. The battery was replace within one week. since then I've charged the new battery approximately 25 times and the battery has failed. Highly disappointed in the battery life. I will have to purchase another battery to use the tools but I hope that the new battery lasts longer than the original battery.
customer_reviews.author: susan e. davis

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Really nice trimmer. I was hoping it would be lighter though. I have a commercial grade Stihl trimmer and this Greenworks is slightly heavier. And the sword is very long. Thats not a bad thing, but for trimming smaller bushes not a good sword size choice. The battery lasts really long and its very sharp. Does a nice job trimming
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lanyard placement does not balance the tool
customer_reviews.text: The heading says it all. Even with the lanyard, the tool takes a bit of muscle to use. Part of the problem is (what I consider) the wrong placement for the lanyard attachment. No, the position is not adjustable, only the strap length. The unit remains very top heavy. The unit itself is not heavy, but when you are the fulcrum for a top heavy pole, it seems quite heavy. Other than that, the unit performed great. I have about 100 large azaleas and gardenias on a hill, and a pole hedger is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: roslynzs

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Its heavy with the battery installed but sure does cut through even the thickest bushes
customer_reviews.author: BadToo

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted about an hour before jamming
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer jammed and stopped working on the first use. I was using it maybe 30 minutes then the blades stopped running. I was cutting branches/bushes well within the range of its capacity so I can't understand what made the blades jam. It also very top heavy so when you do not need to cut something far away, it's kind of a pain to maneuver and hold. Should offer more of a telescoping/adjustable feature. It seemed promising and heavy duty at first look, but unfortunately did not hold up to its expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Y.

customer_reviews.title: Our FOURTH GreenWorks 80V tool, a well balanced BEAST with great battery life!
customer_reviews.text: As others have suggested, this is a well balanced BEAST. A little heavy, even with the lighter 80V 2.0AH battery. Weight is only a real problem if you have lots of trimming above your shoulders. Pleasantly surprised at the cutting capability and the battery life is great! This is our fourth (interchangeable tool string trimmer, chain saw, snow shovel and hedge trimmer) GreenWorks 80V tool and we have both an 80V 2.0AH and 4.0AH battery. Battery recharges are quick and DO NOT miss the oil/gas mess with the yearly carburetor rebuilds.
customer_reviews.author: ThomBodi

customer_reviews.title: cuts through brush like butter
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ever used one of these hedge trimmers, and I have to say I was impressed how easy it blazed through the brush. Nice to have a cordless version, I can't imagine how much trouble the other kinds could be.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great but Heavy Pole Hedge Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I've tested out the 40V and I thought that was heavy until I got this one. It is a surprisingly silent hedge trimmer, but boy is it heavy at the top. Be prepared for a workout. Thankfully the included shoulder strap helps spread the weight around.
customer_reviews.author: David Kobia

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a real machine. I have used smaller versions like black and Decker but this is outstanding. Cuts thru hedge like butter. I don't have a lot of experience in this but these are what I need for my trimming. I now own the leaf blower, mower, snow blower and string trimmer which use 80V betteries. At this point I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Strickler

customer_reviews.title: .excellent but maybe too heavy for high shrub trimming for me.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cutting ability of heavier limbs/twigs. The unit is heavy though. I will get into regular trimming soon and will know if a 40 amp might have been better for me. Battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: plasticman acrylic

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: we have a 1,000 ft driveway with scrub trees on both sides. my husband who has COPD loved using it. not too heavy, pruned the small trees with no problem. he got 2 hours of run time out of the battery which he was impressed with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery was dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Battery was dead on arrival. Box was damaged on arrival. Hedger's plastic sheath protecting saw blade was broken on arrival. The hedger itself seemed intact and undamaged. However, because the battery was not functional, I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and beautifully designed.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and beautifully designed. This 80V monster will cut through some really thick bushes. It is easy to handle, powerful as heck and long enough to reach the back of most bushes. the unit has so much power it's hard to believe it runs off of a battery. NO MORE ELECTRIC CORD!
customer_reviews.author: robosolo

customer_reviews.title: Shrub maintenance made easy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use and lasts plenty long enough to do my shrubs with power left over. Way nicer than having to deal with gas, exhaust and loud noise or extension cords.
customer_reviews.author: donhop02

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The battery made by the same manufacturer would not even fit into the unit. Went with the smaller 40 W version which is plenty of clothes powerful what the average homeowner would bThe battery made by the same manufacturer would not even fit into the unit. Went with the smaller 40 W version which is plenty of horsepower for what the average homeowner would need.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great machine a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: A great machine with lots of power. I thought I was getting a lighter tool for quick jobs but this will do it all. It is a bit on the heavy side when battery is installed so you should take that in to consideration when you are deciding which size to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy for the convenience if you have a lot of hedges
customer_reviews.text: It will cut through very thick branches hedges but it is very heavy if you're working above your head or reaching to hold it with one hand. Yet very convenient if you're strong enough to use it and cutting tall hedges
customer_reviews.author: M.D.C

customer_reviews.title: Solid so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this puppy in the mail the other day and popped in a fully charged battery. Trimmed up a s***load of hedges at my dad's house on and off for about an hour. No issues at all. Seems bad ass so far. I'll update my review after I've run through some more work over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gere

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! We have quite a few of the GreenWorks Pro 80V items (2 Leaf Blowers, ChainSaw, Snowblower). This one is great as well! Prunes the hedges, shrubs, bushes, small tree branches, etc nicely, cleanly, and easily. We love how the battery charges quickly. Since we have so many GreenWorks Pro items we have 3 batteries so we have continuous operation. Highly recommend this product and product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heavy to use but powerful
customer_reviews.text: power is terrific, but the weight is a factor in longevity of use by a smaller person. My wife can't use it except for very brief periods. cuts like magic through all types of hedge and small tree limbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bluffs native

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for home use. Makes the job quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Battery power kicks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little on the heavy side but cuts hedges very well. Im liking Battery powered outdoor tools more and more!
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool with a SHARP cut.
customer_reviews.text: This pole saw is well designed. I have been using it to trim 1 to 5 inch diameter branches and am amazed at how sharp the chain is even after several hours of work. The battery has been lasting well over an hour of heavy work and recharged fully in about 20-25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JillC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My only beef is that it gets a little heavy if you are doing a lot of trimming but overall it does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Hodge721

customer_reviews.title: Pro trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but praise for this guy. Heavier than a corded electric, but a longer blade, more convenient being cord free, and PLENTY of battery life to do most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vallier

customer_reviews.title: Starts when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 2 stroke Stihl professional grade hedge trimmer. Starts 1st time, lots of power and easy to clean and use. Shares a battery with my pole saw. Live it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Beahm

customer_reviews.title: So far this trimmer works great. It's nice not having to worry about gas ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this trimmer works great. It's nice not having to worry about gas and the battery has plenty of charge for homeowner needs. The trimmer is a little heavy, but it is managable.
customer_reviews.author: Don P

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: Jams way easier than I thought it would. My old as hell black and decker doesn't jam as easily and must be way more dull.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design !
customer_reviews.text: I have several GreenWorks tools they all work good but this product is a bad design tool. It's super heavy I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: PROFESSOR

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely very easy to use, strong enough trimming branches and making the square form on them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Very Heavy
customer_reviews.text: You need to be a strong person to easily handle this. The trimmer cannot be used separately and without the heavy pole. Very tiring to use and not easy to manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Hedger!
customer_reviews.text: This hedger works great! Super sharp and effective. The battery power is a great feature vs. having to deal with gas or plugging it in. We have a couple other Greenworks products, and everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: This hedge trimmer will make yardwork easier and even fun.
customer_reviews.text: This hedge trimmer rocks! It does a better job than I had imagined possible. I was used to a long and painful process of trimming our holly bushes by hand, and getting my arms scratched in the process. This product makes trimming the holly bushes both easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressive Trimmer for a Battery Operated Tool
customer_reviews.text: Have used this trimmer several times for some pretty rough cutting here in the mountains. Very impressed for a battery operated trimmer. Don't know about reliability since I haven't had it very long. But I am impressed thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Super Hedge Trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hedge trimmer I have used. The 80V provides it with enough juice to cut the toughest hedges. The long blade makes it easy to get smooth trims without repetition. Highly recommended to all!
customer_reviews.author: anmbondz

customer_reviews.title: Love battery operated
customer_reviews.text: Works great but a little heavy with extended life battery. A work out. But I love not having keep gas or crank
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service too!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is relatively lightweight too. Excellent customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Tough working product.  You will like
customer_reviews.text: I love the green products. This hedge clippers chewed into my tough bushes and small cherry trees without a jamb
customer_reviews.author: nick stone

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting use to Saved $250.00 on first citrus tree trim I
customer_reviews.author: LeeBoB DoucetRippey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Bushes, palm bushes, monkey grass, and hedges. Good battery life, too.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great power Great size Excellent controls & ability to swivel handle Excellent battety life Slightly heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A monster!! slots big enough for my thumb ...
customer_reviews.text: A monster!! slots big enough for my thumb to fit in.....so it cuts small tree branches......so I can get rid of my large corded electric one.
customer_reviews.author: cherry orchardist

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through all my hedges without a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Trims like a gas trimmer without the noise and fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...
customer_reviews.text: These Green Works 80 V products are fantastic products . These products act and work like full blown commercial tools and have plenty of power and longevity ...
customer_reviews.author: Deryl Houser

customer_reviews.title: Great tool - no need for corded unit
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of long lasting power without a cord. Tool is a little heavy but not burdensome
customer_reviews.author: Garland Favorito

customer_reviews.title: A beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Can clear a field of brush in no time. The only issue is that is a monster to handle. It has some weight to it. I still prefer using this compared to one of the smaller hedge trimmers. I like the battery versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this trimmer, along with almost all the other pieces in the Greenworks set, for a few months and it works great. Relatively quiet and easy to use on typical bushes. Don't expect it to lop off half inch diameter branches.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: love this machine for mowing down the end of season flower garden and trimming all my shrubs! has great power and if not too heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Barb B

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & fast!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent equipment - works beautifully - battery charges fully in less than 30 minutes and it trims hedges very nicely. I was concerned by the WEIGHT of the battery and handle/motor unit; When I got started trimming, however, I didn't notice it being heavy at all. Very nice. Will do business with again.
customer_reviews.author: Truntles

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer is just great. It's long and powerful, had lots of energy stored in the battery and easy to assemble and use. The only cons I see are about the weight of the tool that makes it a little difficult to use for a long time. Over all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: LEORA SALI

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other Greenworks yard equipment I have bought, these hedge trimmers work great. The pivoting cutter head makes it easier to trim the sides of bushes.
customer_reviews.author: User32

customer_reviews.text: This is agreat tool. I am extremely happy with it. The battery can hold it's charge longer than this 62 year old woman needs it to. I have been using it cut poison ivy and weeds in and along ditches. It could use a handle on the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: I've yet to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer is a beast, I've used it to cut through hedges I thought I may need a chainsaw for. As with the rest of the Greenwoeks line, for the price, I've yet to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wolvedger

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY...  Broke the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine right up until the swivel head broke during the first time I used it. It's design is shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: EGD

customer_reviews.title: I love all of the GreenWorks 80 volt tools
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the GreenWorks 80 volt tools.This is excellent ,I tried it as soon as I got it and trimmed all the bushes with no jams and it is really fast.This is not heavy so it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Wynona

customer_reviews.title: This is a Bad Boy
customer_reviews.text: Men this product is terrific!! It really gets with it. I have a 150ft. 6 ft. high hedge. It did the job admirably. When you do, go 80 volt; it's well worth the extra change.
customer_reviews.author: Phil J.

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Runs great and so far up to 3 hours with fully charged battery. Could use a additional handle for extended height work. Trimmer cuts good for 1\2 inch branches.
customer_reviews.author: Charrito

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I need. Does the job as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty o'power
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars since it has the power to cut through any branch the thickness of your thumb or smaller Not 5, since the branch may end up looking like you chewed through it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Minyon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item, Works well -- Very powerful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe the battery life. This thing is as heavy duty as any corded hedge trimmer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks is horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. Nonexistent. Battery life is horrible. Charger breaks down. No way to contact customer service. On hold over an hour. Run from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Made a nice choice
customer_reviews.text: Love it, lighter and much more quieter than my gas Stihl (18") trimmer and just as effective. I hope the unit and the battery are made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Seeker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for large areas
customer_reviews.text: Where has it been all my life! No freakin power cord.... GREAT for large areas
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Great job- love being cordless.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. It gets heavy with the higher bushes.
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMomma

customer_reviews.title: Mucho muscle, & Sharp claws
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and powerful so do be careful, dont think of this as a "kiddie version" of its motorized cousins; it is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: KoiKeeper

customer_reviews.title: clippers
customer_reviews.text: very strong clippers, battery lasts and the same battery fits my weed eater and blower.
customer_reviews.author: Benny H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use - excellent for smaller plants/bushes - larger limbs not so good
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Trebelhorn

customer_reviews.title: Well made hedge trimmer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid and well made hedge trimmer.It cuts through even the thickest shrubs and bushes and the blades are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and rounds out my suite of GreenWorks stuff - heavy though
customer_reviews.author: Spinnetti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the freedom of cordless...cuts thru hedges like hot butter
customer_reviews.author: Roger Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: First class product performs flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and handle - cuts like knife thru butter - so quiet when operating - love the freedom of being cordless
customer_reviews.author: Mark MM

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase to date
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very powerful and has cut through my shrubs with ease. My biggest worry when purchasing this unit was battery life. So far the battery has not been an issue. It wont go on forever but then again neither will I. I am very happy with my purchase to date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package tampered with
customer_reviews.text: Box had been opened and battery was removed from box and then taped back. Ridiculous that someone would open and remove something and tape it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Deutschendorf

customer_reviews.title: Battery life seems to last long.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it trimmed my bushes with ease. Battery life seems to last a while too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Tool for the System
customer_reviews.text: Great balance, plenty of power, cuts branches up to 1/2", adjustable grip a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hedge trimmer but requires arm strength
customer_reviews.text: This cordless hedge cutter is incredibly efficient and works much better than my last electric model. 4/5 stars because of the incredible weight! I knew this prior to buying, so it was not a shock. Make sure you eat your spinach or move on to a different, lighter model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GreenWorks Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd GreenWorks tool. I also have the 80v snow thrower, and chainsaw. These are great tools! They have plenty of power, and low maintenance. The death of the cord is finally here. 80v batteries are the only way to go. Forget the 40v, 20v, and any other battery.....they simply are not as good. My only fault with the hedge trimmer would be it's weight. With the 80v battery installed, your arms will get tired. However it's not a huge problem, since I tend to cut in shifts anyway. And, no more electrical cords to accidentally cut.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but rather heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. But, it's rather heavy with that 80V battery. I'll bet you would get tired out and put it away before the battery runs down!
customer_reviews.author: Al Feitl

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being a bit heavy this product works as advertised. No cords, no gas, no plugs, no oil and less noise. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it really lasts and cuts like a gas powered machine without the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful series of tools. Can't wait to get the whole set. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Public Reviewer # 1

product_meta.title: Greenworks PRO 26-Inch 80V Cordless Hedge Trimmer, Battery Not Included GHT80320
product_meta.description: Size:26 inches| Style:Tool OnlyGreenWorks Pro 80V System offers a range of commercial grade tools for the professionals and those who just want more power. Rib through miles of hedges without the vibration and fumes from a gas engine. With a 26-inch dual action steel blade and anti-jam technology, you can get up to 60 minutes of run time with a fully charged 2ah battery. The brushless motor delivers greater torque and durability with a variable speed trigger offering up to 3000 SPM and 3/4-inch cut capacity. With an extra battery on hand, you can switch from one tool to the next and complete your job without the hassle of gas. Compatible batteries currently include a 2ah (model GBA80200) and 4ah (model GBA80400) battery and rapid charger (model GCH8040). The 2ah battery charges within 30 minutes so you can get back to work and finish that job. The 4ah battery charges within 1 hour.
feature_bullets: Up to 60 minutes of run time with fully charged 2AH battery, battery not included
DigiPro brushless motors are more reliable and delivers gas equivalent performance
26 inch laser cut steel blades for professional results
Rapid 30 minute charge for standard 80V 2ah battery, multiple battery capacity available
Battery and charger not include, compatible battery and charger models GBA80200, GBA80400 and GCH8040

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
